product_name: The North Face Chugach 16 Pack - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Big enough to carry lunch, water and other necessities without weighing you down, The North Face Chugach 16 pack will quickly become your first-choice pack for inbounds and backcountry adventures. Combination of Cordura Bombastic nylon and ballistic nylon fabrics stands up to wear and tear in the backcountry. Chugach 16 features an innovative avalanche tool pocket to keep your backcountry necessities easily accessible. Ski and snowboard carry system holds gear secure when hiking in the backcountry. Insulated hydration port protects hydration reservoir tube; hydration reservoir not included. Curved shoulder straps, sternum strap and waistbelt ensure a stay-put fit; back panel resists light rain and snow. Closeout.
short_description: Big enough to carry lunch, water and other necessities without weighing you down, The North Face Chugach 16 pack will quickly become your first-choice pack for inbounds and backcountry adventures.
